word:
Those who have been exercised by this false spirit have a depressed, sunken, empty, void, unsatisfied, stupid feeling. They will feel a lack of the grace of God, be in danger of speaking impatiently and from the impulse 


                                   -231- 

of the moment, feel that they have lost all their religion, though they hardly know how.--Ms 3, 1854. (Testimony to churches in New York State, February 12, 1854.)
